Package io.github.ai4ci.config

Interface ExperimentConfiguration

@Immutable @Modifiable public interface ExperimentConfiguration
Central configuration interface for JPanSim2 experiments.

This immutable configuration interface defines all parameters needed to run an experiment in JPanSim2, including:

  • Batch job configurations (via BatchConfiguration)
  • Setup configurations (via SetupConfiguration and SetupFacet)
  • Execution configurations (via ExecutionConfiguration and ExecutionFacet)
  • Replication counts for both setup and execution phases

Key features:

  • Supports SLURM parallelisation through batch configuration
  • Provides methods for generating configuration subsets per batch node
  • Includes JSON serialisation/deserialisation capabilities
  • Allows configuration composition through facets and modifications

Each experiment consists of a set of simulation setups (defined by setup facets) and a set of execution configurations (defined by execution facets). The configuration supports generating all combinations of setups and executions, as well as replicating each configuration multiple times for statistical robustness. In the end the number of simulations run will be:

  • Number of setups = product of modifications across all setup facets
  • Number of executions = product of modifications across all execution facets
  • Total simulations = setups * executions * setup replications * execution replications
Different setup facets or setup replications will usually be shared between different SLURM nodes, but the execution configurations and execution replications will be typically be run in parallel within one node according to the batch configuration. The optimal SLURM parallelisation will therefore be to have a node per setup facet * setup replication and then run all execution facets and execution replications in parallel within each node.

Example usage: 


 ExperimentConfiguration config = ExperimentConfiguration.readConfig(path);
 BatchConfiguration batchConfig = config.getBatchConfig();
 List<SetupConfiguration> setups = config.getBatchSetupList();
Author:
Rob Challen

  • Field Details

    • DEFAULT

      static final io.github.ai4ci.config.ImmutableExperimentConfiguration DEFAULT
      Default immutable configuration instance used when no other configuration is provided. Includes:
      • Defaults from BatchConfiguration.DEFAULT
      • Single setup facet with SetupConfiguration.DEFAULT
      • ExecutionConfiguration.DEFAULT
      • 1 replication for both setup and execution

  • Method Details

    • readConfig

      static ExperimentConfiguration readConfig(Path file) throws com.fasterxml.jackson.core.exc.StreamWriteException, com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.DatabindException, IOException
      Reads and deserializes an ExperimentConfiguration from a JSON file. Supports JSON with comments and handles Guava collection types.
      Parameters:
      file - Path to JSON configuration file
      Returns:
      Deserialized ExperimentConfiguration
      Throws:
      com.fasterxml.jackson.core.exc.StreamWriteException - on JSON parsing errors
      com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.DatabindException - on data binding issues
      IOException - on file system errors
      See Also:
      • writeConfig(Path, boolean)

    • exporter

      default SimulationExporter exporter(Path baseDirectory)
      Creates a SimulationExporter configured for this experiment's batch settings. The exporter will use the batch-specific output directory if running in a multi-node SLURM batch job.
      Parameters:
      baseDirectory - Root directory for output files
      Returns:
      Configured SimulationExporter instance
      See Also:
      • getBatchDirectoryPath(Path)

    • getBatchConfig

      io.github.ai4ci.config.ImmutableBatchConfiguration getBatchConfig()
      Gets the batch configuration parameters for SLURM job parallelisation.
      Returns:
      Immutable batch configuration instance
      See Also:
      • BatchConfiguration

    • getBatchDirectoryPath

      default Path getBatchDirectoryPath(Path baseDirectory)
      Gets the batch-specific output directory path. In multi-node SLURM jobs, this returns a subdirectory named with the batch number. Otherwise returns the base directory unchanged.
      Parameters:
      baseDirectory - Root directory for output files
      Returns:
      Batch-specific output directory path

    • getBatchSetupList

      default List<SetupConfiguration> getBatchSetupList()
      Generates a subset of experiment setups relevant to the current SLURM node. When running in a multi-node SLURM batch job, this method splits the full setup list into chunks and returns only the portion assigned to this node.
      Returns:
      List of setup configurations for this batch node
      See Also:
      • getSetup()

    • getExecution

      default List<ExecutionConfiguration> getExecution()
      Generates all execution configurations by applying all modifications from execution facets and expanding replications. This includes:
      • Applying all modifications from execution facets
      • Generating replicated configurations when replications > 1
      • Ensuring each configuration has a unique name
      Returns:
      Complete list of execution configurations with modifications applied
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if any modification lacks a name

    • getExecutionConfig

      io.github.ai4ci.config.execution.ImmutableExecutionConfiguration getExecutionConfig()
      Gets the base execution configuration before modifications.
      Returns:
      Immutable base execution configuration
      See Also:
      • ExecutionConfiguration

    • getExecutionReplications

      int getExecutionReplications()
      Gets the number of replications to generate for each execution configuration.
      Returns:
      Number of execution replications (minimum 1)

    • getFacets

      List<ExecutionFacet> getFacets()
      Gets the list of execution facets containing modifications to apply. Facets are processed in order with each modification building on previous results.
      Returns:
      List of execution configuration facets
      See Also:
      • ExecutionFacet

    • getSetup

      default List<SetupConfiguration> getSetup()
      Generates all setup configurations by applying all modifications from setup facets and expanding replications. This includes:
      • Applying all modifications from setup facets
      • Generating replicated configurations when replications > 1
      • Ensuring each configuration has a unique name
      Returns:
      Complete list of setup configurations with modifications applied
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if any modification lacks a name

    • getSetupConfig

      List<SetupFacet> getSetupConfig()
      Gets the list of setup facets defining possible experiment configurations. Each facet contains a base configuration and optional modifications.
      Returns:
      List of setup configuration facets
      See Also:
      • SetupFacet

    • getSetupReplications

      int getSetupReplications()
      Gets the number of replications to generate for each setup configuration.
      Returns:
      Number of setup replications (minimum 1)

    • withExecutionConfig

      default io.github.ai4ci.config.ImmutableExperimentConfiguration withExecutionConfig(io.github.ai4ci.config.execution.ImmutableExecutionConfiguration config)

    • withFacet

      default io.github.ai4ci.config.ImmutableExperimentConfiguration withFacet(String name, io.github.ai4ci.config.PartialExecutionConfiguration... config)
      Creates a new configuration with an additional execution facet containing the specified modifications. The facet will be named with the provided name parameter.
      Parameters:
      name - Name for the new execution facet
      config - Modifications to include in the new facet
      Returns:
      New ExperimentConfiguration instance

    • withSetupConfig

      default io.github.ai4ci.config.ImmutableExperimentConfiguration withSetupConfig(SetupConfiguration config)
      Creates a new configuration with the specified setup configuration. Replaces any existing setup configurations with a single facet containing the provided configuration as its default.
      Parameters:
      config - The new setup configuration to use
      Returns:
      New ExperimentConfiguration instance

    • writeConfig

      default void writeConfig(Path directoryOrFile, boolean overwrite) throws com.fasterxml.jackson.core.exc.StreamWriteException, com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.DatabindException, IOException
      Serializes this configuration to JSON and writes it to the specified path. If the path doesn't end with '.json', creates a 'config.json' file in the specified directory. Creates parent directories if needed.
      Parameters:
      directoryOrFile - Path to directory or file for output
      overwrite - If true, overwrites existing file; otherwise, throws an exception if the file already exists
      Throws:
      com.fasterxml.jackson.core.exc.StreamWriteException - on JSON serialization errors
      com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.DatabindException - on data binding issues
      IOException - on file system errors
      See Also:
      • readConfig(Path)
